title: You Know You Belong To Me
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Please don't go
Stay though it hurts you, I know
In the moonlight bright
And the shadows cold
You know you belong to me
[Verse 2]
I see your face
Your love seems a lifetime away
But the shadows come
And the shadows go
You know you belong to me
[Bridge]
When the night falls
When the tears come
When the pain makes you afraid
Let the wind blow
Let the clouds come
Let the rain wash it away
[Verse 3]
For love is strange
It goes through every possible change
When the crying’s done
And the shadows go
You know you belong to me

[Outro]
In the moonlight bright
And the shadows cold
You know I belong to you
